article_text: But unless we replace the ACA with a brilliant idea that its opponents have thus far kept shrouded in secrecy, getting rid of Obamacare will mean one thing: Millions of Americans — including 200,000 of our neighbors here in Arkansas — will go back to being uninsured, a lifestyle that I wouldn't tolerate for myself and my family for a single day.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news

og.title: ‘Live Fearless' (Gwen Moritz Editor's Note)

article_metadata.description: ArkansasBusiness.com is the website partner of the Arkansas Business journal.
